properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.initial-size
properties.description: Druid连接池初始连接数

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.min-idle
properties.description: Druid连接池最小空闲连接数

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.max-active
properties.description: Druid连接池最大活跃连接数

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.max-wait
properties.description: Druid连接池获取连接最大等待时间（毫秒）

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.validation-query
properties.description: Druid连接池验证查询SQL

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.test-while-idle
properties.description: Druid连接池空闲时检测连接有效性

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.test-on-borrow
properties.description: Druid连接池借用时检测连接有效性

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.test-on-return
properties.description: Druid连接池归还时检测连接有效性

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.time-between-eviction-runs-millis
properties.description: Druid连接池连接回收间隔（毫秒）

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.min-evictable-idle-time-millis
properties.description: Druid连接池连接最小空闲时间（毫秒）

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.pool-prepared-statements
properties.description: Druid连接池是否开启预编译语句池

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.max-pool-prepared-statement-per-connection-size
properties.description: Druid连接池每个连接最大预编译语句数

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.enabled
properties.description: Druid监控页面是否启用

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.url-pattern
properties.description: Druid监控页面URL模式

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.login-username
properties.description: Druid监控页面登录用户名

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.login-password
properties.description: Druid监控页面登录密码

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.stat-view-servlet.reset-enable
properties.description: Druid监控页面是否允许重置

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.filter.stat.enabled
properties.description: Druid统计过滤器是否启用

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.filter.stat.slow-sql-millis
properties.description: Druid慢查询阈值（毫秒）

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.filter.stat.log-slow-sql
properties.description: Druid是否记录慢SQL

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.filter.stat.merge-sql
properties.description: Druid是否合并相同SQL统计

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.enabled
properties.description: Druid SQL防火墙是否启用

properties.name: spring.datasource.druid.filter.wall.config.multi-statement-allow
properties.description: Druid SQL防火墙是否允许多语句执行
